main.name: Himmet GENCER
main.description: Hi, I am Himmet. I am a Software R&D Coordinator at TDG Company. Most of my work is electronic projects. I create solutions and products for Structural Health Monitoring Sytems.
main.bio: I am a Software R&D Coordinator at TDG Company. Most of my work is electronic projects. I create solutions and products for Structural Health Monitoring Sytems.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a researcher and am always interested in playing around with new technologies

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering (BE) Electrical and Electronics Engineering

work.company: TDG Earthquake and Structural Health Monitoring Systems
work.title: Software Development Coordinator
work.description: Manage of Software R&D team Development and design of embedded systems, gui design such as data acquisition and test software, web applications and backend services for structural health monitoring

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Information Management Systems/Network Enterprise Systems/Enterprise Application Development (PAF Team)

skills.name: C/C++
skills.description: I use C/C++ for embedded programming on MCU.

skills.name: LabVIEW
skills.description: I use LabVIEW for GUI designs and applications such as data acquisition and test software.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: I enjoy Python because it allows fast programming.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for version control.

skills.name: Embedded Systems
skills.description: I have designed and developed many different Embedded Systems. STM32, NXP MCU,  I2C, SPI, CAN, RS485, UART, PWM, TCP, UDP, ADC, DAC, GPS, USB, RTOS .

skills.name: Measurement and Test Systems
skills.description: I have designed and developed many different Measurement and Test Systems. Such as Data Acquisition Systems, Servo Hydraulic and Electromechanical Test and Control Systems.

skills.name: Sensor Technologies
skills.description: I have used many different sensors. Accelerometer, Strain Gauge, IMU, Thermocouple, Loadcell, Tiltmeter, Displacement .

skills.name: MERN Stack
skills.description: I use MERN Stack when creating web based applications.
